DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacodynamic drug interaction cilostazol statin ( simvastatin CYP3A substrate rosuvastatin non-CYP3A substrate ) healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamic Drug Interaction Between Cilostazol Statins
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects suitable study visit Clinical Trial Center , Samsung Medical Center 7 day pharmacodynamic sampling perform follow administration study drug .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 20 55 year A body mass index range 18.5 27 kg/m2 Willingness participate entire study period Written inform consent fully inform study procedures Any past medical history hepatic , renal , neurologic , cardiovascular , respiratory , endocrine , hematooncologic psychiatric disease Active bleeding bleeding tendency History gastrointestinal disease surgery possibly affect drug absorption History clinically significant drug hypersensitivity Use medication within 7 day first dose Heavy drinker ( > 140 g/week ) Whole blood donation 60 day study Judged eligible study participation investigator
